page.title: 05Transport
page.content: There is four and a half kilometres of motorway going through our area.It is a three lane motorway which goes in each direction.It goes across the clay vale from east to west.There are no junctions along our stretch of motorway but the east Swindon junction is only three kilometres away and the west Swindon junction is only one and a half kilometres away.It was built to provide fast easy transport. It actually separates Swindon from Wroughton. The main road that joins Wroughton to Swindon the A361 passes over the M4 motorway. The M4 motorway is very busy even in the mid-afternoon.In 5 minutes over 50 cars go under the A361 Wroughton to Swindon road in each direction.
